title: Episode 44: Cheers to the Crew at Your Neighborhood Trader Joe's
itunes:title: Cheers to the Crew at Your Neighborhood Trader Joe's
description:
As we wind down another year on the calendar, this episode of Inside Trader Joe’s is a celebration of the nearly 55,000 Crew Members in the 530 (and counting!) Trader Joe’s stores across the country. Their hard work and dedication make Trader Joe’s a favorite place to shop in neighborhoods from Portland, Oregon to Portland Maine, and San Diego to Miami. We’d like to raise a glass and say “Cheers!” to every Trader Joe’s Crew Member, in every store, every day.

Transcript (PDF)
